bug.author: Arquestro
bug.summary: Flake8 error while executing "make codestyle" command
bug.description:
Description: Command "make codestyle" exits with flake8 error: "no such option: --inline-quotes". To reproduce:
Install flake8, version 3.7.8. Run "make codestyle" in root of catalyst repository on HEAD if master remote branch.
Expected: Codestyle checked successfully with no errors from flake8.
